# Control Temperature (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]], [[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (a drop of mercury)/DF

**Range:** 20 ft./level

**Area:** 20 cu. ft./level emanation, centered on you

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 92

You imbue an area with cold or fire energy, reducing or raising the temperature by one temperature band per five caster levels. Effects of the new temperature on creatures and the environment are incurred immediately.
